name: Rave of Pasig
description: The Adventure Park has several highlights including the zip line, which is said to be the longest and the tallest in Metro Manila. The zip line is 200 meters long and about six stories high. There’s also a wall climbing site and obstacle courses. Another outdoor attraction is the Outdoor Lagoon, which is man-made with a depth of four feet. Visitors can rent boats to paddle through the lagoon.
